I would rather have higher level numbers of potions of speed effect 
endurance, not speed.  A level 100 potion of speed is disasterous 
because your steps are too big.

How would we change teleporters to make them better?

I'd start by making it impossible to plant trees on teleporters or 
otherwise block teleporters from being used..  An even better idea 
would be a new setting on teleporters: either everybody can use a 
certain teleporter or only 1 team can.  I would also like teleporters 
to allow you to jump in water or a forest, but you get a level 1 
potion of flight when you do so.
